ComicInfo.Title: 13 Badges, Part 3: Conclusion
ComicInfo.Summary:
Twelve street judges have been slaughtered by a masked maniac with a dimension-jump machine. He has the thirteenth in his gun sights right now, and the only Judge who can stop the killer—Dredd—is a billion miles away. But it’s not so much the number of dead judges in the morgue. It’s what’s going to happen to their bodies very, very soon…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Brendan McCarthy | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Inaki Miranda (a) & Eva de la Cruz (c) | 2 |

ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Brendan McCarthy, Eva de la Cruz, Inaki Miranda
ComicInfo.Characters: Chief Judge Cal, Judge Anderson, Judge Death, Judge Dredd, Judge Karyn, Judge Omar, Judge Tarjay
ComicInfo.Teams: Judges of Mega-City One, Psi-Division, Special Judicial Squad
